entity.entitySummary: This relates how different parties use circumscriptions or how a single party may use a circumscription differently over time.
entity.entityDescription: This table stores 'links' to correlative uses of circumscriptions by parties. For example: The standard circumscription accepted by plants from 1994-2000 for Carya ovalis (Wangenh.) Sarg. var. hirsuta (Ashe) Sarg. correlates with the standard accepted usage of Carya glabra (P. Mill.) Sweet var. hirsuta (Ashe) Ashe by Plants - actually it is a subset of Carya glabra (P. Mill.) Sweet var. hirsuta (Ashe) Ashe.

attribute.attDefinition: Database assigned value corresponding to a unique relationship between two uses of a circumscription
This key is related to the key PARTY_CIRCUM2, both of which are pointing to usages of circumscriptions in the STATUS table.
This key is related to the key PARTY_CIRCUM2, both of which are pointing to usages of circumscriptions in the STATUS table.
This attribute is used to describe the relationship between two party-circumscriptions.
This attribute is the date on which two party-circumscriptions began to relate to one another.
This attribute is the date on which two party-circumscriptions stopped relating to aone another.
